trans-unit.source: A control used for selecting a type.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter> can be used imperatively or declaratively.
The following code example demonstrates how to use TypePresenter in a custom activity designer.
It binds the TypePresenter control to the "Text" property of the corresponding activity of the activity designer.
The "Text" property is of type "System.Type".
Creates a new instance of a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref> that initializes a collection of wrapper objects that each represent a primitive type.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the string (`null`) will be shown in the type presenter, which allows you to select null for the type.
`true` if the property can be `null`; otherwise, `false`.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type `null` can be selected from the type presenter.
Gets or sets an indication whether the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref> control.
`true` if the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref> control; otherwise, `false`.

Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type browser should be shown directly when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref> control.
Gets or sets whether the activity type resolver dialog window should be centered.
`true` if the window should be centered; otherwise, `false`.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the activity type resolver dialog window should be centered.
Gets or sets whether a type browser dialog window should be centered.
`true` if the window should be centered; otherwise, `false`.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the type browser dialog window should be centered.
Gets or sets the value of an editing context property.
An editing context item.
Dependency property identifier field that contains a property of the editing context, for instance a list of currently selected objects or a list of services running in the designer.
Gets or sets the default types used most recently.
Returns <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1"></xref> that contains the default types used most recently.
Gets or sets the filter used to show types.
By default, the following types are shown in the type presenter/type browser
Project system case
All public types in referenced assemblies/projects
All public types in current project
Standalone XAML case (file in rehosted application/file opened in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] without solution opened)
All public types in all assemblies loaded in the AppDomain
By setting the filter property, you can limit the number of types shown in the type browser to only those types that are valid for your activity.
A delegate with one return value and a Boolean value that represents the filter used to show types.
Dependency property identifier field that designates what filter is used to show types.
Puts the keyboard focus on the current presenter control.
Initializes a combo box.
The contents of this method are generated by the designer.
Gets an enumeration of wrapper types that are in the current type presenter.
An enumeration of wrapper types that are in the current type presenter.
Gets or sets the display name for a component.
The display name for a component.
Dependency property identifier field that defines the label of a control.
Gets or sets the types used most recently.
The types used most recently.
Dependency property identifier field that designates the most recently used types.
Declaration of the event that gets raised when a property on the specified user interface control has been changed.
Gets the value used for a component display name.
A string name.
Dependency property identifier field that assigns the text that is used for a component display name.
Gets or sets the type of the current <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref>.
A type object.
Provides event accessors for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserClosedEvent> is raised when the user closes the browser.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the user closed the browser.
Provides event accessors for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeBrowserOpenedEvent> is raised when the user opens the browser.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the user opened the browser.
Provides event accessors for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter.TypeChangedEvent> is raised when the user changes the type of the selected control.
Dependency property identifier field that designates whether the component type has changed.
Gets the display name for a component type.
A string that represents the display name.
Dependency property identifier field that designates the current type represented by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter"></xref>.
Obsolete.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
